dt: {bc}prompted by natural instinct or propensity {bc}arising spontaneously

pt: {sc}spontaneous{/sc} {sc}impulsive{/sc} {sc}instinctive{/sc} {sc}automatic{/sc} {sc}mechanical{/sc} mean acting or activated without deliberation. {sc}spontaneous{/sc} implies lack of prompting and connotes naturalness.
{sc}impulsive{/sc} implies acting under stress of emotion or spirit of the moment.
{sc}instinctive{/sc} stresses action involving neither judgment nor will.
{sc}automatic{/sc} implies action engaging neither the mind nor the emotions and connotes a predictable response.
{sc}mechanical{/sc} stresses the lifeless, often perfunctory character of the response.

shortdef: of, relating to, or being instinct
prompted by natural instinct or propensity : arising spontaneously
